synopsis.text: Three years before the main events of the anime, Hiroomi Nase is sent on a mission by Izumi to find and subdue the infamous half-human, half-youmu Akihito Kanbara. Hiroomi's younger sister Mitsuki, curious about her brother's dangerous work, decides to secretly tag along. When the siblings track down Akihito, they discover that other factions are also seeking him out for their own mysterious reasons. This prequel episode chronicles the Nase siblings' fateful first encounter with Akihito, kicking off a chain of events that years later leads them all to be embroiled in supernatural conflicts and complex relationships. Though originally intent on capturing Akihito, Hiroomi and Mitsuki end up forging a connection with him that profoundly impacts their future. Full of action and intrigue, this special episode offers fans insight into the show's main characters' pasts while setting the foundation for the dangerous adventures and bonds between humans and youmu that lie ahead in the main story.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
